tool_description: Calculates final settlement amounts after currency conversion, fees, taxes, and other adjustments for multi-currency transactions.
error_messages: Invalid gross amount: Gross amount must be positive and greater than total deductions.
Invalid currency code: Use valid ISO 4217 currency code.
Negative processing fees: Processing fees cannot be negative.
Tax rate out of range: Tax rate must be between 0 and 50 percent.
Invalid withholding tax: Withholding tax cannot be negative.
Chargeback reserve out of range: Reserve percentage must be between 0 and 20 percent.
usage: Provide gross_amount, currency, and processing_fees. Optionally set tax_rate, withholding_tax, and chargeback_reserve. Returns detailed settlement calculation with all deductions.

total_deductions.description: Sum of all deductions from gross amount
